existing_features.title: Fix the error that occurs after uploading photos in the media entry form to ensure images are properly stored and displayed without errors
Rename the application from 'Media Tracker' to 'Mofongo Tracker' in all user-facing locations including the HTML title, header logo text, and any other displayed references
Add functionality for any user to change the banner photo that is displayed globally for all users in the Layout component header area

new_feature_requests.summary: Add option to change banner photo for everyone
